scripts.create-database: set PGPASSWORD=Senha123&& psql -U postgres -h localhost -f sql/create_database.sql
scripts.create-schedules: set PGPASSWORD=Senha123&& psql -U postgres -h localhost -d mcoffee -f sql/create_schedules.sql
scripts.seed-schedules: set PGPASSWORD=Senha123&& psql -U postgres -h localhost -d mcoffee -f sql/seed_schedules.sql
